Paragraph: On the antiarrhythmic activity of one N - substituted piperazine derivative of trans - 2 - amino - 3 - hydroxy - 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 - tetrahydroanaphthalene .

Sure! Here are the chemical entities mentioned in the paragraph:

1. N - substituted piperazine derivative
2. trans - 2 - amino - 3 - hydroxy - 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 - tetrahydroanaphthalene

2. Aniline (2-amino-3-hydroxy-1,2,3,4-tetrahydroanaphthalene)
3. N-substituted piperazine derivative (a derivative of piperazine with a substituted nitrogen atom)
